attributes.action: Change all traffic lights to prioritise the flow of traffic.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A vast majority of traffic lights have sensors fitted, these sensors are not regulated.

All traffic lights should operate to the same uniformed manner, they should all be made to operate with the volume of traffic thus easing congestion and increasing the flow of traffic.

Traffic lights that change to red as they are approached (traffic calming) should be outlawed.

Traffic lights that change quickly because they are approached should be outlawed.

Traffic lights that work from timed sequence should be the exception and should be assessed on merit and be granted special circumstance permission.
